name: volume-set-space
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Change volume space information.

Writes a copy of the volume file, with the spacing information changed as specified.  No reordering of the voxel data occurs, see -volume-reorient to change the volume indexing order and reorder the voxels to match.  Exactly one of -plumb, -sform, or -file must be specified.

inputs.name: volume_in
inputs.description: the input volume

inputs.name: volume_out
inputs.description: output - the output volume

inputs.name: plumb
inputs.description: set via axis order and spacing/offset

type.name: plumb
type.description: set via axis order and spacing/offset

inputs.name: axis_order
inputs.description: a string like 'XYZ' that specifies which index is along which spatial dimension

inputs.name: x_spacing
inputs.description: change in x-coordinate from incrementing the relevant index

inputs.name: y_spacing
inputs.description: change in y-coordinate from incrementing the relevant index

inputs.name: z_spacing
inputs.description: change in z-coordinate from incrementing the relevant index

inputs.name: x_offset
inputs.description: the x-coordinate of the first voxel

inputs.name: y_offset
inputs.description: the y-coordinate of the first voxel

inputs.name: z_offset
inputs.description: the z-coordinate of the first voxel

inputs.name: sform
inputs.description: set via a nifti sform

inputs.name: xi_spacing
inputs.description: increase in x coordinate from incrementing the i index

inputs.name: xj_spacing
inputs.description: increase in x coordinate from incrementing the j index

inputs.name: xk_spacing
inputs.description: increase in x coordinate from incrementing the k index

inputs.name: x_offset
inputs.description: x coordinate of first voxel

inputs.name: yi_spacing
inputs.description: increase in y coordinate from incrementing the i index

inputs.name: yj_spacing
inputs.description: increase in y coordinate from incrementing the j index

inputs.name: yk_spacing
inputs.description: increase in y coordinate from incrementing the k index

inputs.name: y_offset
inputs.description: y coordinate of first voxel

inputs.name: zi_spacing
inputs.description: increase in z coordinate from incrementing the i index

inputs.name: zj_spacing
inputs.description: increase in z coordinate from incrementing the j index

inputs.name: zk_spacing
inputs.description: increase in z coordinate from incrementing the k index

inputs.name: z_offset
inputs.description: z coordinate of first voxel

inputs.name: file
inputs.description: copy spacing info from volume file with matching dimensions

type.name: file
type.description: copy spacing info from volume file with matching dimensions

inputs.name: volume_ref
inputs.description: volume file to use for reference space

inputs.name: opt_ignore_dims
inputs.description: copy the spacing info even if the dimensions don't match
